content.rendered:
FAQs

Does my ticket include admission to the co-located events?

Yes, with your pass, you will be able to explore the exhibit floors of the Healthcare Robotics Engineering Forum and DeviceTalks events.

What is the attire for the conference?

Business casual. To ensure comfort, consider layers to adjust for temperature changes in the meeting rooms.

Are there any precautions being taken due to Covid19?

We will be following CDC guidelines that the venue provides us. Check here for the most up to date information.

What is the refund policy if the event is cancelled?

If the event gets cancelled you will have the opportunity to get a refund or defer to a different year.

Are hotel accommodations included in registration?

No. Hotel accommodations are not included in the price of your ticket. However, we will have a small block of rooms available at a special rate for conference guests. Check here for other local hotels in the area

Are meals included with my registration?

No meals are included with your registration. The exhibit hall will have concessions available to purchase food. There will be a welcome reception on Tuesday night with light appetizers.
